entry.title: Brazil's Presidential Candidates Court Evangelical Vote
entry.content: Incumbent Jair Bolsonaro and his leftist rival Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva are battling to portray themselves as closest to one particularly influential figure: God.

entry.title: Ukrainians Moved From Kherson as Russia Announces Martial Law in Occupied Regions
entry.content: Citizens of the only regional capital seized by Moscow since its invasion began were urged to leave as Russia declared martial law in occupied regions of Ukraine, as it tries to strengthen its hold on territories where Kyiv has regained ground.
